org.springframework.samples.petclinic.jdbc
Class AbstractJdbcClinic

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      org.springframework.jdbc.core.support.JdbcDaoSupport
          org.springframework.samples.petclinic.jdbc.AbstractJdbcClinic
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, Clinic, CachingClinic
Direct Known Subclasses:
HsqlJdbcClinic, MySQLJdbcClinic
public abstract class AbstractJdbcClinic
extends org.springframework.jdbc.core.support.JdbcDaoSupport
implements Clinic, CachingClinic

Base class for JDBC implementations of the Clinic interface.

Author:
Ken Krebs, Juergen Hoeller, Rob Harrop
